      • mnistAsStream

        public static Stream<DenseVector> mnistAsStream(String imagesPath,
                                                String labelsPath,
                                                Random rnd,
                                                int cnt)
                                         throws IOException
        Read random count samples from MNIST dataset from two files (images and labels) into a stream of labeled vectors.
        Parameters:
        imagesPath - Path to the file with images.
        labelsPath - Path to the file with labels.
        rnd - Random numbers generator.
        cnt - Count of samples to read.
        Returns:
        Stream of MNIST samples.
        Throws:
        IgniteException - In case of exception.
        IOException

        Read random count samples from MNIST dataset from two resources (images and labels) into a stream of labeled vectors.

        imagesPath - Path to the resource with images.

      • asLIBSVM

        public static void asLIBSVM(String imagesPath,
                            String labelsPath,
                            String outPath,
                            Random rnd,
                            int cnt)
                     throws IOException
        Convert random count samples from MNIST dataset from two files (images and labels) into libsvm format.
        Parameters:
        imagesPath - Path to the file with images.
        labelsPath - Path to the file with labels.
        outPath - Path to output path.
        rnd - Random numbers generator.
        cnt - Count of samples to read.
        Throws:
        IgniteException - In case of exception.
        IOException
